title: It should not be tradition that champions are always broken on release now.
body: Once again a reworked/new champion is broken. Just like Irelia, Yuumi, Akali, Aatrox, etc. It is absolutely ridiculous that we are conditioned to expect this, and i expect the same for the next champion coming out as well. We simply do not have enough bans to deal with all of these champions anymore that Riot is powercreeping.
